parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Markers </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the marker alpha. The marker is only modified on the computer where the command is called.
<br>
When alpha equals <tt>1</tt>, the marker is visible, but if alpha equals <tt>0</tt>, then the marker is invisible.
<br>
Alpha can be numbers and fractions. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> marker '''setMarkerAlphaLocal''' alpha </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> marker: [[String]] -  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> alpha: [[Number]] -  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> Nothing </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>"my_marker" [[setMarkerAlphaLocal]] 0.5;</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>"enemy_convoy_marker" [[setMarkerAlphaLocal]] 0;</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[setMarkerAlpha]], [[setMarkerBrush]], [[setMarkerColor]], [[setMarkerDir]], [[setMarkerPos]], [[setMarkerShape]], [[setMarkerSize]], [[setMarkerText]], [[setMarkerType]], [[createMarker]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>
